channel.title: Linux on Erlang & Go

item.title: upstart 설정
item.description: /etc/init/appname.conf description &quot;appname&quot; author &quot;xxx&quot; start on startup stop on shutdown chdir /home/xxx/appname respawn script export HOME=&quot;/home/xxx&quot; export AWS\_ACCESS\_KEY_ID= export AWS\_SECRET\_ACCESS_KEY= exec /home/xxx/appname/app -c=&quot;config.json&quot; end script $ sudo initctl reload-configuration $ sudo start appname
